name: <%= package_name %>
author: <%= package_author %>
description: Yeoman generator for a WordPress starter theme (using Underscores) with npm.

scripts.scss:style: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map maps --source-map-contents false --source-map-embed true --precision 6 sass/style.scss .tmp/style.css
scripts.scss:woocommerce: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map maps --source-map-contents false --source-map-embed true --precision 6 sass/woocommerce.scss .tmp/woocommerce.css
scripts.serve: browser-sync start --proxy "<%= proxy_address %>/<%= proxy_domain %>" --reload-delay 2000 --files "*.css, js/*.js, **/*.php, languages/*.pot, !node_modules/**/*.html, !bower_components*.*"
scripts.uglify: mkdirp dist/js && uglifyjs js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.lang: echo Update <%= theme_domain %>.pot file & wp-pot --src "**/*.php" --dest-file "languages/<%= theme_domain %>.pot" --domain <%= theme_domain %> --package "<%= package_name %>" --bug-report "<%= author_uri %>" --team "<%= package_author %> <%= author_email %>"
scripts.build-css:style: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map maps --source-map-contents true --precision 6 --omit-source-map-url sass/style.scss dist/<%= theme_domain %>/style.css
scripts.build-css:woocommerce: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map maps --source-map-contents true --precision 6 --omit-source-map-url sass/woocommerce.scss dist/<%= theme_domain %>/woocommerce.css
scripts.build: run-s -l lang clean copy build-css:* arc
scripts.arc: echo Create <%= theme_domain %>.zip & cross-zip dist/<%= theme_domain %> dist/<%= theme_domain %>.zip
